name: The Palm Cove Escape
summary: Relax and unwind on the serene beaches of Palm Cove
description: Enjoy stunning sunsets, gentle waves, and palm-lined shores. Perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers looking for peaceful retreats.

name: The Coral Coast Explorer
summary: Discover vibrant coral reefs and tropical marine life
description: Dive and snorkel in crystal-clear waters, explore hidden lagoons, and experience the thrill of ocean adventures along the Coral Coast.

name: The Sunset Bay Getaway
summary: Chase stunning sunsets on the golden sands of Sunset Bay
description: From kayaking adventures to bonfire nights, Sunset Bay offers the perfect blend of relaxation and fun-filled activities by the sea.

name: The Hidden Lagoon Retreat
summary: Secluded beaches and luxury private villas await
description: Escape to untouched lagoons and secret beaches with crystal-clear waters. Perfect for those seeking ultimate relaxation and privacy.

name: The Surf Haven
summary: Catch the best waves at the world's top surf destination
description: From beginners to pros, Surf Haven offers top-notch instructors, epic waves, and unforgettable beach vibes for all surf lovers.
